abstract: A man who became wealthy working on Wall Street contributed money that helped mobilize the Occupy Wall Street movement.
snippet: A man who became wealthy working on Wall Street contributed money that helped mobilize the Occupy Wall Street movement.
lead_paragraph: Robert S. Halper, a retired Wall Street trader, spends time each day in Zuccotti Park talking to protesters about politics and their thoughts on reforming the banking system.

headline.main: He Made It on Wall St. and Used It to Help Start the Protests
